metadata.title: CVE-2017-7382 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The PdfFontFactory.cpp:200:88 code in PoDoFo 0.9.5 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and applicationcrash) via a crafted PDF document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7382` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpodofo-utils - 0.9.5-9
libpodofo0.9.5 - 0.9.5-9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.5-9').
